message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe this product will greatly benefit your business and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $900000 for this product. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that $900000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $1025000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my target profit margin.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
